item.title: ‘How can you fit your life in a car?’ As the Pacific Palisades wildfire rages, Malibu business owners face grim new realities.
item.description: When your neighborhood is destroyed by fire, what do you take with you? And how do you face the future?

item.title: There goes 80% of the market, says one reaction to new White House microchip rules
item.description: The White House on Monday announced new restrictions on artificial intelligence exports that will impact companies including Nvidia.
